overview:
Eddie Hartman is a co-founder of LegalZoom.com, where he is the Chief of Strategy and President, Attorney Services Division.

Mr. Hartman was formerly the Senior Vice President for Technology of XCEED International (NASDAQ: XCED). His responsibilities included integrating XCEED’s existing technology base; setting all direction for new applications; and managing the technical strategy for clients ranging from CBS to FirstAuction (the Home Shopping Network’s web presence) to the United States Chamber of Commerce. Mr. Hartman is the author of XCEED’s internal technology strategy and is the author of two web-based applications, MajorFind and Megaphone.

Mr. Hartman received his education at Yale, the University of Pennsylvania (Wharton), and CalTech.
